---
title: "CCFRP Angler Newsletter"
output: html_document
date: "2026-02-19"
---
```{r}
anews <- read_csv("hw_newsletter_dat.csv")
anews_1 <- anews %>% 
  mutate(species = as.factor(species))
gear_type_fly <- anews_1 %>% 
  filter(gear == "FLY") %>% 
  group_by(species, gear, site) %>% 
  summarise(count =n(), .groups = "drop") %>% 
  filter(count > 4)
gear_type_bar <- anews_1 %>% 
  filter(gear == "BAR") %>% 
  group_by(species, gear, site) %>% 
  summarise(count =n(), .groups = "drop") %>% 
  filter(count > 4)
gear_type_bat <- anews_1 %>% 
  filter(gear == "BAT") %>% 
  group_by(species, gear, site) %>% 
  summarise(count =n(), .groups = "drop") %>% 
  filter(count > 4)
```
```{r}
gear_type_fly_m <- gear_type_fly %>% 
  filter(site == "MPA")
gear_type_fly_m %>% 
  mutate(count = as.factor(count))
ggplot (data = gear_type_fly_m, aes(x = gear, y = count, fill = species)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
   scale_fill_manual(name = "Species", values = c("steelblue2",  "purple", "darkgreen","darkred", "goldenrod3", "black", "thistle3", "coral2", "aquamarine2", "darkolivegreen3"))+
  coord_polar(theta = "y", start=0) +
  theme_void() +
  theme(
    legend.text = element_text(size = 8),
    legend.title = element_text(size = 9)
  ) +
  theme(
    legend.key.size = unit(0.4, "cm")
  )
```
